shef.mt.tools

Class BParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.tools.Resource
      • shef.mt.tools.BParser

  • public class BParser
extends Resource
    A wrapper around Berkeley Parser. It loads the official BerkeleyParser classes from the official .jar file and allows the initialization of the parser in memory and performing a parse given a sentence.
